sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO comtntroblinfo ( TROBL_ID /* */ , TROBL_NM /* */ , TROBL_KND /* */ , TROBL_DC /* */ , TROBL_OCCRRNC_TIME /* */ , TROBL_RQESTER_NM /* */ , TROBL_REQUST_TIME /* */ , TROBL_PROCESS_RESULT /* */ , TROBL_OPETR_NM /* */ , TROBL_PROCESS_TIME /* */ , PROCESS_STTUS /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ ) VALUES ( #troblId# /* */ , #troblNm# /* */ , #troblKnd# /* */ , #troblDc# /* */ , #troblOccrrncTime# /* */ , #troblRqesterNm# /* */ , #troblRequstTime# /* */ , #troblProcessResult# /* */ , #troblOpetrNm# /* */ , #troblProcessTime# /* */ , #processSttus# /* */ , #frstRegisterId# /* */ , SYSDATE() /* */ , #lastUpdusrId# /* */ , #lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE comtntroblinfo SET TROBL_ID=#troblId# /* */ , TROBL_NM=#troblNm# /* */ , TROBL_KND=#troblKnd# /* */ , TROBL_DC=#troblDc# /* */ , TROBL_OCCRRNC_TIME=#troblOccrrncTime# /* */ , TROBL_RQESTER_NM=#troblRqesterNm# /* */ , TROBL_REQUST_TIME=#troblRequstTime# /* */ , TROBL_PROCESS_RESULT=#troblProcessResult# /* */ , TROBL_OPETR_NM=#troblOpetrNm# /* */ , TROBL_PROCESS_TIME=#troblProcessTime# /* */ , PROCESS_STTUS=#processSttus# /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID=#frstRegisterId# /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM=#frstRegistPnttm# /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID=#lastUpdusrId# /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM=#lastUpdtPnttm# /* */ WHERE TROBL_ID=#troblId# /* */
sqlMap.select: SELECT TROBL_ID /* */ , TROBL_NM /* */ , TROBL_KND /* */ , TROBL_DC /* */ , TROBL_OCCRRNC_TIME /* */ , TROBL_RQESTER_NM /* */ , TROBL_REQUST_TIME /* */ , TROBL_PROCESS_RESULT /* */ , TROBL_OPETR_NM /* */ , TROBL_PROCESS_TIME /* */ , PROCESS_STTUS /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ FROM comtntroblinfo WHERE TROBL_ID=#troblId# /* */

SELECT TROBL_ID /* */ , TROBL_NM /* */ , TROBL_KND /* */ , TROBL_DC /* */ , TROBL_OCCRRNC_TIME /* */ , TROBL_RQESTER_NM /* */ , TROBL_REQUST_TIME /* */ , TROBL_PROCESS_RESULT /* */ , TROBL_OPETR_NM /* */ , TROBL_PROCESS_TIME /* */ , PROCESS_STTUS /* */ , FRST_REGISTER_ID /* */ , FRST_REGIST_PNTTM /* */ , LAST_UPDUSR_ID /* */ , LAST_UPDT_PNTTM /* */ FROM comtntroblinfo WHERE 1=1
TROBL_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
TROBL_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
ORDER BY TROBL_ID DESC /* */ limit #firstIndex#, #recordCountPerPage#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM comtntroblinfo WHERE 1=1
TROBL_ID = #searchKeyword# /* */
TROBL_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#searchKeyword#,'%') /* */
